text: Hwayang-dong is a dong in west Gwangjin-gu in Seoul, South Korea. It was joined into Gwangjin-gu on 13 August 1949. It is a mixed home and small business area. Mojin-dong is administered by Hwayang-dong. It has Konkuk University. ==References== ==Other websites== * Gwangjin-gu official website in English * Chronicle of Beopjeong-dong and Haengjeong-dong * Map of Gwangjin-gu at the Gwangjin-gu official website * Hwayang-dong resident office website Category:Subdivisions of South Korea
title: Hwayang-dong
